paragraphs.text:
%md
Add Spark Interpreter property: spark.cassandra.connection.host  node.cassandra.l4lb.thisdcos.directory

import com.datastax.spark.connector._
val hrs = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "cardata", "keyspace" -> "connectedcar"))
  .load()
  
  hrs.show()

import scala.collection.Map
val limits = Map("Mr. Me" -> 40)
val toLabel = (l: Int, v:Long) => if (v > l) 1 else 0 
val deviceAndHRAndLimit = df.map(r => (r.getString(1).toInt, r.getInt(0), toLabel(limits.getOrElse(r.getString(2), 120), r.getInt(0)), r.getString(2)))

result.msg:
import scala.collection.Map
limits: scala.collection.Map[String,Int] = Map(Mr. Me -> 40)
toLabel: (Int, Long) => Int = <function2>
deviceAndHRAndLimit: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[(Int, Int, Int, String)] = MapPartitionsRDD[67] at map at <console>:58

paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.util
import org.apache.spark.mllib
import org.apache.spark.mllib.tree.DecisionTree
import org.apache.spark.mllib.tree.model.DecisionTreeModel
import org.apache.spark.mllib.regression.LabeledPoint
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.{Vector, Vectors}

val numClasses = 2
val categoricalFeaturesInfo = Map[Int, Int]()
val impurity = "gini"
val maxDepth = 5
val maxBins = 32

val splits = deviceAndHRAndLimit.map(tuple => LabeledPoint(tuple._3, Vectors.dense(tuple._1, tuple._2)))
                              .randomSplit(Array(0.6, 0.4), seed = 11L)

val (training, test) = (splits(0).cache(), splits(1))

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.util
import org.apache.spark.mllib
import org.apache.spark.mllib.tree.DecisionTree
import org.apache.spark.mllib.tree.model.DecisionTreeModel
import org.apache.spark.mllib.regression.LabeledPoint
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.{Vector, Vectors}
numClasses: Int = 2
categoricalFeaturesInfo: scala.collection.Map[Int,Int] = Map()
impurity: String = gini
maxDepth: Int = 5
maxBins: Int = 32
splits: Array[org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.spark.mllib.regression.LabeledPoint]] = Array(MapPartitionsRDD[69] at randomSplit at <console>:69, MapPartitionsRDD[70] at randomSplit at <console>:69)
training: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.spark.mllib.regression.LabeledPoint] = MapPartitionsRDD[69] at randomSplit at <console>:69
test: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.spark.mllib.regression.LabeledPoint] = MapPartitionsRDD[70] at randomSplit at <console>:69

paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.classification.{LogisticRegressionModel, LogisticRegressionWithLBFGS}
import org.apache.spark.mllib.evaluation.MulticlassMetrics
import org.apache.spark.mllib.regression.LabeledPoint
import org.apache.spark.mllib.util.MLUtils

val model = new LogisticRegressionWithLBFGS().setNumClasses(2).run(training)

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.classification.{LogisticRegressionModel, LogisticRegressionWithLBFGS}
import org.apache.spark.mllib.evaluation.MulticlassMetrics
import org.apache.spark.mllib.regression.LabeledPoint
import org.apache.spark.mllib.util.MLUtils
model: org.apache.spark.mllib.classification.LogisticRegressionModel = org.apache.spark.mllib.classification.LogisticRegressionModel: intercept = 0.0, numFeatures = 2, numClasses = 2, threshold = 0.5

paragraphs.text:
val predictionsAndLabels = test.map { case LabeledPoint(label, features) =>
  val prediction = model.predict(features)
  (prediction, label)
}

predictionsAndLabels.collect()

import org.apache.spark.mllib.evaluation.MulticlassMetrics
val metrics = new MulticlassMetrics(predictionsAndLabels)

println(metrics.confusionMatrix)
println("Please use above values in the pmml below")
println(metrics.precision)

paragraphs.text:
%sh

export PMML='<?xml version="1.0"?>
<PMML version="4.1" xmlns="http://www.dmg.org/PMML-4_1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.dmg.org/PMML-4_2 http://www.dmg.org/v4-2/pmml-4-1.xsd">
<Header copyright="Copyright (c) 2015 emil" description="RPart Decision Tree Model">
<Extension name="user" value="emil" extender="R/PMML"/>
<Application name="R/PMML" version="1.4"/>
<Timestamp>2015-02-17 13:42:44</Timestamp>
</Header>
<DataDictionary numberOfFields="2">
<DataField name="Color" dataType="string">
<Interval closure="closedClosed" leftMargin="0" rightMargin="1"/>
</DataField>
<DataField name="heartrate" optype="continuous" dataType="double">
<Interval closure="closedClosed" leftMargin="0" rightMargin="240"/>
</DataField>
</DataDictionary>
<TreeModel modelName="Model" functionName="classification" algorithmName="rpart" splitCharacteristic="binarySplit" missingValueStrategy="defaultChild">
<MiningSchema>
<MiningField name="Color" usageType="predicted"/>
<MiningField name="speed" usageType="active"/>
</MiningSchema>
<Output>
<OutputField name="Predicted_Color" optype="categorical" dataType="string" feature="predictedValue"/>
<OutputField name="Probability_0" optype="continuous" dataType="double" feature="probability" value="0"/>
<OutputField name="Probability_1" optype="continuous" dataType="double" feature="probability" value="1"/>
</Output>
<Node id="1" score="0" recordCount="24" defaultChild="2">
<True/>
<ScoreDistribution value="0x80FF0000" recordCount="19" confidence="2171.0"/>
<ScoreDistribution value="0x8000FF00" recordCount="5" confidence="0.0"/>
<Node id="2" score="0x80FF0000" recordCount="17">
<SimplePredicate field="speed" operator="greaterOrEqual" value="120"/>
<ScoreDistribution value="0x80FF0000" recordCount="17" confidence="1"/>
<ScoreDistribution value="0x8000FF00" recordCount="0" confidence="0"/>
</Node>
<Node id="3" score="0x8000FF00" recordCount="7">
<SimplePredicate field="speed" operator="lessThan" value="120"/>
<ScoreDistribution value="0x80FF0000" recordCount="2" confidence="0.0"/>
<ScoreDistribution value="0x8000FF00" recordCount="5" confidence="2663.0"/>
</Node>
</Node>
</TreeModel>
</PMML>'
echo $PMML>model.tmp
curl -X POST -d @model.tmp http://YOUR PUBLIC AGENT ELB/model
rm model.tmp
